title: URF Figurine on sale during Figure Fest
body:
I was just curious about this figure because I want to buy this figure alongside another but I am unsure about something...

Does the urf figure come with a free random figure like it did during urf mode? It's just that since it was brought back during figure fest I was wondering whether that still applied or not. It would be nice to get value from buying the urf figure and getting a random figure but I still don't know whether that is still valid. I guess that also includes the other stuff you get with the urf figure like when you did during the urf mode time period.

If anyone can help me out that'd be great

replies.body: Hey buddy, cheers for posting about this, I wouldn't have known about the Urf Figure otherwise. Missed out on him back when he was available last time because of the limited stock but thanks to you I was able to snag him with my purchase. ^_^
did you get a random figure with your Urf order? I just got my urf delivered today and no random figure was sent with it :(
Did you get a random figure with your Urf order, i just got mine today and no random figure was sent with it :(

Hey Gerish,  there was a problem with order confirmation page and the order tracking specifically for Oceania. The extra figurine was not supposed to be included. Apologies for the confusion.
MM

Dotachin you are awesome!!!

Like DreamlessDays  I missed out back in April and I was not aware of this :)
I can confirm that when you buy the figuring, you also get a random one :)

http://s16.postimg.org/ovlc399id/2_12_15_10_23_51_AM.png

EDIT: Hey guys, today I received my delivery and there is no extra figurine included. I contacted Player Support and they confirmed there was a problem with order confirmation page and the order tracking specifically for Oceania. The extra figurine was not supposed to be included. If you are curious about your specific situation please contact player Support. Apologies for the confusion.
MM
mine arrived today with no random figure with it :(

Hey Vexus, today I received my delivery and there is no extra figurine included. I contacted Player Support and they confirmed there was a problem with order confirmation page and the order tracking specifically for Oceania. The extra figurine was not supposed to be included. If you are curious about your specific situation please contact player Support. Apologies for the confusion.
MM
Hehe, well it's nice to know that I have actually helped people about knowing that this was on sale. Well anyway, happy purchasing stranger :)

Hang on, I just realised that you are a Riot member haha. Didn't see the whole Riot icon thing till I actually looked properly. Even still, it's nice to have reminded people. I wasn't sure where to ask at first but the boards was an option and yeah.
It's brought back in figure fest? I can't see it...
If you scroll right down to the bottom and look at the bottom left, you'll see a spatula icon. You click on that and if you win the minigame, you can add him to your cart

Hey Dotachin,

Yup, it looks like it's included!
